EnableAssessment.description: If the key is present and has a value of YES, Gatekeeper is enabled. If the key is present and has a value of NO, Gatekeeper is disabled.

AllowIdentifiedDevelopers.description:
If the key is present and has a value of YES, Gatekeeper’s “Mac App Store and identified developers” option is chosen. If the key is present and has a value of NO, Gatekeeper’s “Mac App Store” option is chosen.
                    If EnableAssessment is not true, this key has no effect.

PayloadOrganization.description: This value describes the issuing organization of the profile, as displayed to the user

PayloadIdentifier.description: A unique identifier for the payload, dot-delimited.  Usually root PayloadIdentifier+subidentifier

PayloadType.description: The type of the payload, a reverse dns string

PayloadVersion.description: The version of the whole configuration profile.
